SELECT a.title noticeTitle, a.content noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.turn_path turnPath FROM notice a WHERE a. STATUS = 1 AND a.del_flag = 1 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT a.match_info_id matchInfoId, a.match_name matchName, a.logo_img logoPath, CONCAT(IFNULL(a.city_name,''),'-',IFNULL(a.district_name,'')) region, (SELECT title FROM class WHERE id = a.match_type) matchType, CONCAT(a.start_date,'~',a.end_date) matchTime, a.status, CASE a.status WHEN 1 THEN '报名中' WHEN 2 THEN '待开赛' WHEN 3 THEN '进行中' END statusStr FROM match_info a WHERE a.del_flag = 1
AND a.city_id = #{cityId}
